ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This research was supported by the Italian Ministry of Education, University and Research (MIUR) (PRIN project 2015 “BIOPIC”, 2015BABFCF). Scanning and transmission electron microscopy data were obtained at the Centro Universitario di Microscopia Elettronica (CUME; Università degli Studi di Perugia, Italy). We thank Filippo Cardelli for the help in the EAG experiments.
